arts.ttl: Sheffield United man to fly out tomorrow to complete transfer – Blades keeping small part of his future
arts.sum: Sheffield United midfielder Ismaïla Coulibaly is set to leave the club and join Austrian side LASK Linz. That’s according to journalist Sacha Tavolieri, who reports that the midfielder will leave Sheffield United on a free transfer, but the Blades will retain a 5% clause on any profit LASK make on the player in future.
